resources.string: Conversion things to keep in mind:\n

string-array.name: InfoString
string-array.item: •Two letters from source text are separated by space in Morse Code output
•Space between two words from Source Text is displayed as forward slash (\"\\\") in Morse Code Output

resources.string: Morse code is a method used in telecommunication to encode text characters as standardized sequences of two different signal durations, called dots(.) and dashes (-), or dits and dahs. Morse code is named after Samuel Morse, one of the inventors of the telegraph.
